textAfterTable: Secure (SSL) SSL 465 POP3 Server (Incoming Messages) Non-Encrypted AUTH 110   Secure (SSL) SSL 995   Googlemail - Gmail Server: Authentication: Port: SMTP Server (Outgoing Messages) smtp.gmail.com SSL 465   smtp.gmail.com StartTLS 587 POP3 Server (Incoming Messages) pop.gmail.com SSL 995   Please make sure, that POP3 access is enabled in the account settings. Login to your account and enable POP3. You also need to enable "less secure apps" (third party apps) in the Gmail settings: https://support.google.com/accounts/answer/6010255?hl=en   Outlook.com Server: Authentication: Port: SMTP Server (Outgoing Messages) smtp.live.com StartTLS 587 POP3 Server (Incoming Messages) pop3.live.com SSL 995   Office365.com Server: Authentication: Port: SMTP Server (Outgoing Messages) smtp.office365.com StartTLS 587 POP3 Server (Incoming Messages) outlook.office365.com SSL 995   Note: If the above settings are not working for your account, then login to the outlook web app, go to the "Settings" > "Options" > "Account" > "My Account" > "Settings for POP and IMAP Access".   Yahoo Mail Server:
